column2: Native Dutch with professional Mandarin Chinese (HSK5/C1) and English language proficiency.
Building innovative Sino-Dutch communities in order to stimulate knowledge exchange.

column1: Implementing and sharing a creative way to solve complex, thematic problems, like:

column2: How to learn Chinese in two years?
How to solve the societal controversy of neuroscience?
In other words: How to innovate?

column1: If you are interested in my way of working, feel free to experience it by collaborating with me. My email address: tibordrost@gmail.com.
